title: People are so petty with their toxicity in ARURF.
body:
Like normal games and ranked games where teamwork and objectives is most important can be frustrating when everyone is not onboard and you have a {{champion:75}} who cares more about stacks than inhibitors.

But URF is a whole different story where it's about spamming abilities and getting towers as fast as possible from what I'm experiencing. But on PBE URF almost every game there's someone who goes AFK or flames the person under performing.

Riot do you even punish PBE accounts?

replies.body:
> PBE URF

The only important part of this post, tell me more.
It's a game mode where abilities are at 80% cooldown.
I hear PBE can be even worse than the regular game. Any truth to that?

Without a doubt. People flame all the time and say "report ........... for feeding" and dodging because they don't get their champs and shit talking when they play zed, yi, garen etc. As someone who plays league 24/7 other than recently. I can confirm.
